pkgmetadata.longdescription: Distance Metrics for Trees Generated by Congreve and Lamsdell // Includes the 100 datasets simulated by Congreve and Lamsdell (2016) doi:10.1111/pala.12236, and analyses of the partition and quartet distance of reconstructed trees from the generative tree, as analysed by Smith (2019) doi:10.1098/rsbl.2018.0632.
